name: CATSTRONAUT: To the Core
description:
Catstronaut: To the Core 

is a small game made in 2 days for a local game jam.

The goal of the game is to solve puzzles and get to the core of the ship. to solve these puzzles you have 2 main abilities:

  • Flipping gravity
  • Changing your size

If you're holding an object while using your abilities, the object will be effected by them too, so scaling up while holding a cube will also scale up that cube

Made by:

  • Rio Derham
  • Roza Salahi
  • Amber Bouchier
  • Federico Nocioni
